# Eman Hospital

> Official machine-readable overview for LLM and AI systems.

## Website
- URL: https://emanhospital.com/
- Contact: https://emanhospital.com/contact

## About
Eman Hospital is a healthcare provider in Pakistan offering consultations, diagnostics, and specialty care.

## Primary Services
- General Medicine
- Pediatrics
- Gynecology
- Cardiology
- Dermatology
- Dental Care
- Nutrition
- Physiotherapy
- Radiology & Imaging
- Laboratory Testing

## Important Pages
- Home: https://emanhospital.com/
- Doctors: https://emanhospital.com/doctors
- Departments: https://emanhospital.com/departments
- Contact: https://emanhospital.com/contact
- Book Appointment: https://emanhospital.com/booking

## Policies and Crawling
- Robots: https://emanhospital.com/robots.txt
- Sitemap: https://emanhospital.com/sitemap.xml
